creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: somewhat rectangular purple form with rounded R edge at center; L-shaped teal form enters purple rectangle at top; other patterns of lighter and darker purple within the rectangular form; red spot with halo at URQ of purple form; curving red form at R, abutting curved R side of rectangle; curving yellow figure frames top of purple form; very light blue circular form URQ; horizontal sweeping impressed lines URQ and along L edge; curved light blue form at L
title: Pantomorphic
